mapper.select: SELECT lc.`type` , sum(lc.minute) AS total_minute FROM life_color lc WHERE lc.do_date > date_sub(now(), interval 1 year) GROUP BY lc.`type`
SELECT lc.`type` , count(lc.id) AS total_num FROM life_color lc WHERE lc.do_date > date_sub(now(), interval 1 year) GROUP BY lc.`type`

SELECT group_name AS name, COUNT(*) as value from (SELECT CASE WHEN (lc.time_point <= '23:00:00' and lc.time_point > '12:00:00') THEN '12-23' WHEN (lc.time_point <= '24:00:00' and lc.time_point > '23:00:00') THEN '23-24' WHEN (lc.time_point <= '01:00:00' and lc.time_point > '00:00:00') THEN '00-01' ELSE '01-12' END AS group_name FROM life_color lc where lc.`type` = 'S' and lc.time_point is not null and lc.do_date > date_sub(now(), interval #{num} day)) a GROUP BY a.group_name;

SELECT group_name AS name, COUNT(*) as value from (SELECT CASE WHEN lc.minute <= 360 THEN '<6h' WHEN lc.minute > 360 and lc.minute <= 420 THEN '6-7h' WHEN lc.minute > 420 and lc.minute <= 480 THEN '7-8h' ELSE '>8h' END AS group_name FROM life_color lc where lc.`type` = 'S' and lc.minute is not null and lc.do_date > date_sub(now(), interval #{num} day)) a GROUP BY a.group_name;
